external_references.description: Chen, J., et al. (2022). Delving Deep: An Analysis of Earth Lusca’s Operations. Retrieved July 1, 2022.

objects.description: [Earth Lusca](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1006) used the command powershell “Get-EventLog -LogName security -Newest 500 | where {$_.EventID -eq 4624} | format-list - property * | findstr “Address”” to find the network information of successfully logged-in accounts to discovery addresses of other machines. [Earth Lusca](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1006) has also used multiple scanning tools to discover other machines within the same compromised network.(Citation: TrendMicro EarthLusca 2022)
